title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1502.5 - Manual fire alarm boxes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1502.5 - Manual fire alarm boxes

State Regulations

One or more manual fire alarm boxes shall be available to
the watchman in an accessible location on each floor and on each
route. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1502.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
